cells.data:
-- lookupTuples :: Eq a => a -> [(a, b)] -> Maybe b
on lookupTuples(k, xs)
    script keyMatch
        on |位|(x)
            k = fst(x)
        end |位|
    end script
    
    script harvestMay
        on |位|(kv)
            Just(snd(kv))
        end |位|
    end script
    
    bindMay(find(keyMatch, xs), harvestMay)
end lookupTuples
